comments.body: Does vis support an actual timezone, or just a UTC offset? some timezones' offsets aren't whole hours :(

Unfortunately, [moment](http://momentjs.com/docs/#/manipulating/utc-offset/) (used by `vis`) only supports the followings. Actually, this PR is using the last one, `minute` format.

``` javascript
moment().utcOffset("+08:00");
moment().utcOffset(8);   // hour: -16 < x < 16
moment().utcOffset(480); // minutes
```
ah right, your formula gives minutes not hours. That seems fine.
